name: Cube Waves
description:
In this arena you only have one choice; survive.
You can either run out the wave timer or eliminate all the enemies.
Beware! The timer gets longer and more enemies will come the longer you survive.

Disclaimer - game is still being developed!
Planned features:
1. sounds/music
1.5. general fixes/improvements
2. increase stats at the end of each wave (enemies will also increase)
3. UI changes(?)
4. :)
Any suggestions will be considered!
